comment.author: 22081583@N06
comment._content:
The "Westward Ho" was a paddle steamer built at Ayr in 1894.
She served most of her life sailing between ports on the Bristol Channel.
She even served as a mine sweeper during W.W.II.
She was scrapped in 1946.

comment.author: 22676925@N05
comment._content: Is there a hatless person on board?
